basic.description:
A study of medical theory and practice from Hippocratic-Galenic traditions to the so-called 'medicalization' of the early 19th century. Topics will focus on the social impact of diseases.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Health and Disease in Western Society

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
